title: List 10 Major LP Tokens from Uniswap and SushiSwap
body:
## Summary

List 10 major LP tokens from Uniswap and SushiSwap.

**Uniswap**

- WBTC / ETH
- ETH / USDT
- USDC / ETH
- DAI / ETH

**SushiSwap**

- [WBTC-ETH](https://sushiswap.fi/pair/0xceff51756c56ceffca006cd410b03ffc46dd3a58)
- [DAI-ETH](https://sushiswap.fi/pair/0xc3d03e4f041fd4cd388c549ee2a29a9e5075882f)
- [USDC-ETH](https://sushiswap.fi/pair/0x397ff1542f962076d0bfe58ea045ffa2d347aca0)
- [ETH-USDT](https://sushiswap.fi/pair/0x06da0fd433c1a5d7a4faa01111c044910a184553)
- [SUSHI-ETH](https://sushiswap.fi/pair/0x795065dcc9f64b5614c407a6efdc400da6221fb0)
- [YFI-ETH](https://sushiswap.fi/pair/0x088ee5007c98a9677165d78dd2109ae4a3d04d0c)

For: List 10 major LP tokens from Uniswap and SushiSwap
Against: Do nothing

## Motivation

Listing LP tokens from these protocol is an idea to increase our TVL under quite low risk. All tokens related to these 10 pairs are major tokens or stablecoins. By listing these LP token, our users are enable to leverage LP tokens. Even these tokens are LP tokens, liquidators are still easy to liquidate and sell, mitigating the risk of the whole protocol.

==========
